title: february 13: a very long sentence
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the longest sentence ever published by the New York Times, and then dives into the history of the iconic paper of record. Afterwards, she talks about the founding of a musical society. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
